VERSION_NOT_FOUND.description: Requested package version is not available
patterns: could not find a version that satisfies
solutions: Check available versions with 'pip index versions <package>'
Remove version constraint or specify different version

GIT_SSH_AUTH_ERROR.description: Authentication failure with Git SSH URLs
patterns: could not read from remote repository
solutions: Use HTTPS URLs instead of SSH

patterns: cannot install .* because these package versions have conflicting dependencies
